entry.title: Tuesday: Near blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this afternoon then periods of light snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
